Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have been expecting you. Well? Have you
picked your finest vegetable to test against my
refined palate?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So this is the promised vegetable. Well then, I
shall have it prepared as a salad post-haste.
<PAGE>
You will, of course, be joining me, correct? Wait
just a moment while I hand this to the maids.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Wait, so you have not brought a vegetable as per
our agreement? Oh well. I will continue to await
your best effort.
